summary: This document is an email chain forwarded within the FBI, containing a first-person account from a woman named Maxwell who describes being sexually harassed by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell on a flight when she was between 12 and 14 years old. The witness details the harassment, the airline staff's failure to intervene, and Maxwell's role as Epstein's protector.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The author of the email who describes being sexually harassed by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell on a flight when she was between 12 and 14 years old.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described by the witness as hitting on her during a flight, showing pictures of his wealth, grabbing her arm, and continuing to harass her after she revealed her age.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described by the witness as making a scene at the gate, fondling Epstein, switching seats to enable his harassment, and angrily dismissing the witness's plea for help, acting as Epstein's protector.

connections.description: Described as a team who sexually harassed the witness; Maxwell acted as Epstein's protector and facilitator during the flight incident.
Maxwell (the witness) describes Ghislaine Maxwell as being abusive, dismissive, and part of the team that harassed her, failing to help when confronted.
Epstein is described as hitting on, harassing, and grabbing the arm of the underage witness (Maxwell) during a flight.

events.title: Flight harassment incident
events.description: A witness (Maxwell) describes being sexually harassed by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell on a commercial flight when she was between 12 and 14 years old. Epstein showed her pictures of his wealth, grabbed her arm, and continued advances after she revealed her age. Ghislaine Maxwell facilitated the situation and dismissed the victim's plea for help.

events.title: Witness email to authorities
events.description: A woman named Maxwell sends an email to US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) detailing her harassment experience from the 1990s, which is then forwarded within the FBI.

keyFacts: A witness named Maxwell provides a first-hand account of being sexually harassed by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell on a flight when she was between 12 and 14 years old.
The witness describes Ghislaine Maxwell as Epstein's active protector and co-participant, who facilitated the harassment and angrily dismissed the victim's plea for help.
Airline staff reportedly refused to intervene, telling the victim to "put up with it" because Epstein was a "powerful man with influence," and they feared retaliation against her pilot father.
The incident was never reported to police, leaving the witness feeling permanently damaged and unsupported.
This correspondence was forwarded within the FBI in July 2021, indicating ongoing investigation or interest in victim testimonies.
